title: Cataloging and Evaluating Dairy Manure Treatment Technologies

tasks.task: Generating tasks related to the physical tasks involved in farming, agriculture, and operating farming equipment based on the given transcript.
subtasks: Identify relevant agricultural or farming-related activities mentioned in the transcript.
Break down the identified activities into general tasks.
For each general task, decompose it into smaller subtasks (specific actions).
Verify the relevance of tasks to physical farming, agriculture, or operating farming equipment.
Formulate the final list of tasks ensuring they are concise and deal with physical actions.
Review the tasks to prevent any redundant or overlapping entries.
Ensure all tasks are clearly connected to the provided transcript.
Categorize the tasks under the appropriate heading (e.g., soil preparation, animal husbandry, machinery operation, etc.).

tasks.task: Understand and support dairy farms in adopting environmental technologies for sustainability.
